MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens affecting properties in Wood Street, Holly Bank Grove, Merton Bank Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 12:17pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on 10th February 2021
